meta.title: Mutugi Riungu
meta.description: A Passionate and skilled Full Stack Software Developer with 7+ years professional experience building web and mobile applications. Equipped with a diverse and promising skill-set. Proficient in various platforms, languages, and embedded systems with expertise in the MERN stack. Experienced with several development tools and procedures.
